decks.notes: This deck focuses on generating poison counters quickly with cards like Prologue to Phyresis and Infectious Inquiry, while also utilizing storm cards like Weather the Storm to gain life and keep the combo going. It aims to draw through the deck efficiently with spells like Deep Analysis and LÃ³rien Revealed, and generate mana with cards like Everflowing Chalice and Pentad Prism. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with poison counters while keeping the combo going with card draw and mana ramp.

The main focus of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to quickly deploy threats like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent while disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells like Force Spike and Spell Pierce. The deck also includes card draw spells like Brainstorm and Deep Analysis to refill the hand and maintain pressure on the opponent. With a low mana curve and a high number of instants and sorceries, this deck aims to win quickly through aggressive creatures and efficient spells.

Control the game using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to gain advantage over your opponent. Use cards like Augur of Bolas and Murmuring Mystic to generate value while disrupting your opponent's game plan. Make efficient use of removal spells like Cast Down and Snuff Out to deal with threats, while maintaining card advantage through spells like Brainstorm and Deep Analysis. Utilize bounce lands like Contaminated Aquifer and Tolarian Terror to fix your mana base and ensure you have the right resources at the right time.

The main focus of this Red Deck Wins Pauper deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. By utilizing cheap and efficient cards like Galvanic Blast, Lightning Bolt, and Goblin Bushwhacker, the deck aims to deal damage early and often to the opponent. With a low mana curve and a focus on fast plays, the deck looks to build up a board presence quickly and finish off the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

The Mono Black Aggro deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent using low-cost creatures and a combination of direct damage spells and lifegain. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with an aggressive strategy while maintaining card advantage through effects like Sign in Blood. The deck also includes cards that provide additional value when creatures die, further increasing the pressure on the opponent. With efficient creatures and a mix of burn spells, the deck seeks to win the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using counterspells, removal spells, and efficient creatures to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also utilizes Gates cards to fix mana and provide additional utility. By controlling the board and card advantage, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and secure victory through careful decision-making and resource management. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Squadron Hawk and Deep Analysis help maintain card advantage and provide additional options for the player to stay ahead in the game.

This deck focuses on flooding the board with early-game creatures and utilizing various combat tricks and pump spells to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The deck includes a mix of cost-effective creatures and card draw, as well as removal spells to manage threats from the opponent. The key strategy is to maintain board presence and apply pressure consistently, using cards like Squadron Hawk and Battle Screech to generate value and maintain momentum in the late game. The deck aims to win through efficient use of its creatures and combat abilities, with a focus on aggressively attacking the opponent.

The main idea of this Pauper 1 vs 1 Combo Goblins deck is to utilize sacrifice and reanimation effects to generate mana and card advantage, while assembling the pieces for a powerful combo finish. The deck focuses on sacrificing creatures like Putrid Goblin and using cards like Skirk Prospector to generate mana, while also taking advantage of graveyard recursion with Unearth. Additionally, the deck includes a few control elements like Mesmeric Fiend to disrupt the opponent's plans. The ultimate goal is to set up a lethal combo using cards like Candy Trail and Dark Ritual for a decisive victory.
